trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> object on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 열거형의 멤버를 사용 하 여의 값을 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 스타일 속성 결정 되는 방식으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 개체는 간단한 텍스트를 표시 하거나 소유자가 그린 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: 소유자가 그린 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 이미지 또는의 나머지 부분과 다른 글꼴을 표시 하는 지원 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 에 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> 컨트롤, while 시스템 그린 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> 만 텍스트 (또는 텍스트 및 아이콘은 아이콘을 표시 하려면 개체를 사용 하는 에 지정 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 소유자가 그린에서 소유자 그리기 작업을 수행 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> 의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> 대리자는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> 열거형 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following codein a form.
trans-unit.target: 예제를 실행 하려면 다음 codein 양식에 붙여 넣으십시오.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 폼의 생성자 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> 이벤트 처리 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is drawn by the owner.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> displays text in the standard font.
